problem_names: lemma divmultassoc: "a div (b*c) * (b*c) = ((a div (b * c)) * b)*(c::nat)"
lemma delmod: "(a::nat) mod (b*c) mod c = a mod c"
lemma timesmod1: "((x::nat)*((y::nat) mod n)) mod (n::nat) = ((x*y) mod n)"
lemma timesmod3: "((a mod (n::nat)) * b) mod n = (a*b) mod n"
lemma remainderexplemma: "(y mod (a::nat) = z mod a) \<Longrightarrow> (x*y) mod a = (x*z) mod a"
lemma remainderexp: "((a mod (n::nat))^i) mod n = (a^i) mod n"
translations: lemma divmultassoc: "a div (b*c) * (b*c) = ((a div (b * c)) * b)*(c::nat)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a div (b * c) * (b * c) = a div (b * c) * b * c
lemma delmod: "(a::nat) mod (b*c) mod c = a mod c"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a mod (b * c) mod c = a mod c
lemma timesmod1: "((x::nat)*((y::nat) mod n)) mod (n::nat) = ((x*y) mod n)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x * (y mod n) mod n = x * y mod n
lemma timesmod3: "((a mod (n::nat)) * b) mod n = (a*b) mod n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a mod n * b mod n = a * b mod n
lemma remainderexplemma: "(y mod (a::nat) = z mod a) \<Longrightarrow> (x*y) mod a = (x*z) mod a"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. y mod a = z mod a \<Longrightarrow> x * y mod a = x * z mod a
lemma remainderexp: "((a mod (n::nat))^i) mod n = (a^i) mod n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a mod n) ^ i mod n = a ^ i mod n
